Malfurion.name: Regrowth
Malfurion.description: Heal target ally for 150 (+4% per level) Health instantly and an additional 420 (+4% per level) Health over 15 seconds.

Malfurion.name: Moonfire
Malfurion.description: Deal 105 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area and reveals them for 2 seconds.

Malfurion.name: Entangling Roots
Malfurion.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds, and deals 117 (+4% per level) damage over the duration. Affected area grows over 3 seconds.

Malfurion.name: Tranquility
Malfurion.description: Heals 80 (+4% per level) Health per second to nearby allied Heroes over 10 seconds.

Malfurion.name: Twilight Dream
Malfurion.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 374 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

Malfurion.name: Innervate
Malfurion.description: Grant an allied Hero 20% of their maximum Mana over 5 seconds. While affected by Innervate, their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.

1.name: Moonburn
1.description: Increase Moonfire's damage to Minions by 75%. Repeatable Quest: Every 5 Minions killed nearby increase this bonus by 1%, up to 25%. After reaching a 25% bonus, Moonburn's bonus damage also applies to Mercenaries and Monsters.

1.name: Scouting Drone
1.description: Places a Scouting Drone at target location, granting vision and revealing a large area around it for 45 seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks. Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Elune's Grace
4.description: Increases the range of Regrowth, Moonfire, and Entangling Roots by 25%.

4.name: Full Moonfire
4.description: Increases Moonfire's radius by 50% and reduces its Mana cost by 5.

4.name: Vengeful Roots
4.description: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 70 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds. Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's damage per second by 8.

7.name: Hindering Moonfire
7.description: Moonfire slows targets by 25% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Lunar Shower
7.description: Using Moonfire reduces the cooldown of the next Moonfire by 0.5 seconds, and increases the damage by 15%. Stacks up to 3 times and resets after 6 seconds.

7.name: Strangling Vines
7.description: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 30% less healing from all sources.

10.name: Tranquility
10.description: Heals 80 (+4% per level) Health per second to nearby allied Heroes over 10 seconds.

10.name: Twilight Dream
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 374 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

13.name: Ice Block
13.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

13.name: Life Seed
13.description: Nearby damaged allied Heroes will automatically gain the heal over time portion of Regrowth. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

13.name: Shrink Ray
13.description: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% and Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Revitalize
16.description: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 50 Mana and causes his Cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.

16.name: Tenacious Roots
16.description: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, lasts 25% longer, and roots targets for 0.25 seconds longer.

16.name: Ysera's Gift
16.description: While above 75% Health, Regrowth's additional healing-over-time is increased by 40%.

20.name: Astral Communion
20.description: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream. Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

20.name: Serenity
20.description: Increases Tranquility's healing by 25% and it also restores 5 Mana per second.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
